title: not able to sync fitbit ionic after Pixel 2 xl OS upgrade
content:
1. I've checked for updates on the phone, installed them, issue persists. OS upgrade broke my connect. Was happy with my Pixel 2 xl till now. Considering a phone from other brands.
2. restarted phone
3. Looked for support phone numbers, but only found this site
4. checked for fitbit ionic updates, there is a new OS available, but cant pull it.
5. Will look into OS upgrade rollback..
